name: Stream Draws
storyline:
Stream Draws With Twitch is a game that lets a stream chat draw amazing (pixel) art during the live stream. It will react to commands in the chat, reply to questions and be entertaining for the streamer and the viewers. 
 
And when it's done? Simply save the created masterpiece and let everyone have it. Or put it on shirts and mugs. Or create a game around it. Or make it your new Stream logo. Or think of something even more amazing! 
 
Ideal for art streamers or just chatting! Stream Draws is the best way to play with your community live on stream and create amazing art in a relaxed way.
summary: Stream Draws With Twitch is a game that lets the stream chat draw amazing (pixel) art during a live stream. Highly customizable options, 26000 known color names or HTML-Color codes. Draw pixel by pixel or with lines. It has an integrated replay function and saves the final image as screenshot and pixel art.
